carousel.name:
Girish Pati Tripathi
Mayor Ayodhya
carousel.data: As part of Ayodhya's dynamic growth, known for the iconic Ram Mandir, we're thrilled to present this innovative app. It provides easy access to a variety of services, embracing digital advancement.

carousel.name:
Rajesh Kumar
Municipal Commissioner
carousel.data: Ayodhya, a city known for its rich cultural heritage and the iconic Ram Mandir, is now embracing digital technology. This app is a step towards making services more accessible to the people.

carousel.name:
Ashwani Kumar
Pandey, IAS
carousel.data: As a fast growing city known for its famous Ram Mandir, Innovative ideas are integral to our development. This app is an innovation in digital technology, helping people access almost all kinds of servicess.
